summary: Completed comprehensive testing of updated Services page with all 10 Azerbaijani services. All requirements fully met - hero section, service cards, descriptions, navigation, and responsive design working perfectly.

design_issues.issue: Language selector data-testid not found in header (minor)

passed_tests: Services page (/services) loads correctly with 'Xidmətlərimiz' title
Hero section displays correct Azerbaijani stats: 5000+ (Mutlu Müştəri), 10+ (Xidmət Növü), 50+ (Ölkə), 7/24 (Müştəri Dəstəyi)
All 10 service cards present and correctly named: Otel Bronu, Aviabiletlər, Turpaketlər, Balayı Səyahətləri, Müalicəvi Turlar, Rayon Turları, Məktəbli Turları, Viza Dəstəyi, Transfer Xidməti, Sığorta
Each service card shows correct Azerbaijani description text (10/10 verified)
All service cards have proper data-testid attributes (service-card-1 through service-card-10)
All service card buttons are clickable with correct 'Ətraflı Bax' text (10/10 verified)
'Niyə Bizi Seçməlisiniz?' section present with all 4 items: Təhlükəsiz Ödəniş, Ən Yaxşı Qiymət, 7/24 Dəstək, 5000+ Müştəri
CTA section displays with correct heading 'Səyahət Planlarınızı Bizimlə Bölüşün'
CTA buttons functional: 'Bizimlə Əlaqə' has tel: link, 'Bizi Arayın: 444 0 387' has WhatsApp link
Navigation to homepage (/) works correctly from services page
Navigation back to services page from homepage works
Navigation to About page (/about) works correctly from services page
Navigation back to services page from about page works
Header navigation 'Haqqımızda' link found and functional
Responsive design works correctly on tablet (768px) and mobile (390px) viewports
All required page elements verified in final comprehensive check (6/6)
Service card hover animations and styling work properly
Page loads without console errors or visual issues
All Azerbaijani text content accurate and properly displayed
